channel.title: Hemant Kumar Singh (HKS), SHER
channel.description: Recent content on Hemant Kumar Singh (HKS), SHER

item.title: About
item.description: Hey! My name is Hemant and I am from Nepal. I was brought up in Biratnagar, completed my schooling in Pokhara and attended high-school in Siliguri. I was fortunate enough to get into National Institute of Technology Warangal which is where I am pursuing my Bacholer’s in Computer Science and Engineering. Additionally, I run The Mind’s Chatter where I write articles on “Life” as a whole.

item.title: QnA on Life by SHER
item.description: Welcome! Here you’ll find answers to some of the most unpleasant/difficult questions that pops up in our minds every now and then. Since everything in the world is relative; some answers may or may not be satisfactory. Most of the answers are short and succint to consume the least amount of time. Some answers are a little lengthy though because they need elaboration. Isn’t it common when our friend needs some help, we’re able to give a good advice; but when we’re in a similar situation we struggle through it?
